name: DEAD ALE
description:
created for the #LDJAM 35 in under 72 hours
did everything myself except for daniel linssen's font x....x

It even has highscore system ;v; (I'll add support for gamejolt scores and achievements later)
The goal is to create as many platforms as you can by jumping or running on them, but jump your way to the top if you can! ;D

See if you can find a hidden feature not in the in game controls list ;b

some people were having trouble starting the game/getting past the menu, use z to select start and ale does start coming up right away so make sure to jump to the next platform! a little tip.. hold z press up then shift right after up ;3
